item.title: Flight Deck First Observer’s Seat (Including Associated Equipment)

numlitem.para: Required minimum safety equipment (safety belt and oxygen) is available,
Seat is acceptable to an FAA inspector for performance of official duties, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

note.para: These provisos are intended to provide for occupancy of above seats by an FAA inspector when minimum safety equipment (oxygen and safety belt) is functional and inspector determines conditions to be acceptable.
The Pilot-in-Command will determine if minimum safety equipment is functional for other persons authorized to occupy any observer seat(s).

placard.para: Placard Seat "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
